Version 1.7.0 ppl show output overhaul

This version contains some fairly substantial changes to the way the ppl show command formats its output. The need for this change was unearthed by a question from @storge on GitHub. In short, the command was only showing one of the given contact’s email addresses, giving the impression that this was all that ppl supported storing.

  • Improved the output format of ppl show
